«No Payment No Headshot!» "Sir Gyles de Murforte"

he guild has been based in 1511 Gyles de Murforte and his wife of the lady de'Manfor. Noble knight Gyles de Murforte was living at king Sajron the First times. In search of glory and gold he went to the Ancient City where was so impressed by fighting traditions professional aden murderers(assassins), so after back at home he has based the similar organization in Hunter Village.
Here you can appoint an award for murder of the player which has offended you.
